Downloaded on January 08,2018 at 04:42:14 UTC from IEEE Xplore. Restrictions apply. ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207:2017(E) Introduction The complexity of software systems has increased to an unprecedented level. This has led to new opportunities, but also to increased challenges for the organizations that create and utilize systems. These challenges exist throughout the life cycle of a system and at all levels of architectural detail. This document provides a common process framework
